XI.iii.1.D.2.k
.
Availability of Burial Flags
All VA offices are initially supplied with an operating inventory of flags based upon demand and other local conditions and must maintain a sufficient supply of flags.Â  Flags stocked for these purposes must not be displayed in public contact areas.
Each issue point is responsible for maintaining its stock of flags.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D  - Memorialization
citation: Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section D
